page.title: 11Things to do in Coulsdon
page.content: When I get home from school I do my homework and have my tea. That takes me until 6.30pm. In the evening I go out with my friends. There is a group of us, about 15, we go around together. We go to parties and discos, which is really good fun. On some evenings we go round to someones house and have a discussion or a general muck around. On a Saturday I go to a Youth Club. We play snooker, table tennis and silly games. On odd days we have video evenings. We get out a couple of videos, usually a sad and a funny one. People come round and watch them and stay the night.
